body.st:
'-------------------------------------
' Created: Wednesday, October 26, 2016
' GET_DB Logic Block
' Description: Simulates the data from the database.
' Language: Structured Text
'
'-------------------------------------
'PLC.FromDB:=IPC.ActiveBits;
'result := IPC.$ActiveBits[0000];

'FOR i:=0 TO 10 BY 1 DO
'PLC.FromDB[i]:=IPC.$ActiveBits[i];;;
'END_FOR;
'PLC.FromDB[0000] := result;


//PLC.FromDB[0000]:=0; //Red Light
//PLC.FromDB[0001]:=1; //Yellow Light
//PLC.FromDB[0002]:=1; //Green Light
//PLC.FromDB[0019]:=1; //Example
//PLC.FromDB[2999]:=1; //Example
//PLC.FromDB[0009]:=1; //Example
